channel.title: 2 Questions
channel.description: How do I make scar type a ' : '? Also, how do I make it so that if it finds a color in the middle of a script it clicks on that color, because whenever I use an if statement at the beginning of my main 'begin' part, it keeps doing the else and even when the first part of the if is supposed to do something, it continues doing the else. How to stop this?

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

seaking:

Is there a place where all the key codes are listed?

Look in the second or third page in the tutorial for “[FAQ] Keykodes” or something. Sorry, I’m too lazy to fetch a link.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @seaking seaking
item.description:
@seaking wrote:

Is there a place where all the key codes are listed? Or can you just type writeln(inttostr(GetKeyCode(‘KEYHERE’))); and have it debug it for you… nevermind just answered my own question.

As for autotyping, use TypeSend, it’s basically an autotyper itself.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Okay… Ty, now, how do I make it type a ’ : '… because it types ;

Use the shift key function. Here is an example:

procedure TypeColon; begin HoldKey(ShiftKeyCodeHere); Wait(250); KeyDown(GetKeyCode(':')); Wait(50) KeyUp(GetKeyCode(':')); end;

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Slave Scyth:

How do I make scar type enter? Tryin to make auto typer

Add “+ Chr(13)” to your message.

If I was you, download SCAR Divi, open it, go to File > Download SRL and use Typesend.

Read full topic
